name: cldss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpancom(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wcel(c1, ctop))
stmt.pretty: mpancom(c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1), c0 ⊆ c2, c1 ∈ Top)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1))), wss(c0, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1)→ c0 ⊆ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Top)
⊣ ((c1 ∈ Top ∧ c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1))→ c0 ⊆ c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1))), wss(c0, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1)→ c0 ⊆ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Top)
⊣ ((c1 ∈ Top ∧ c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1))→ c0 ⊆ c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1))), wss(c0, c2))

stmt.origin: simprbda(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))
stmt.pretty: simprbda(c1 ∈ Top, c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1), c0 ⊆ c2, (c2 \ c0)∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1))), wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c1, ctop), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c1, ctop), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c1, ctop), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wss(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c1))

comment: A closed set is a subset of the underlying set of a topology. (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2006.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
